mapper.sql: id ,building_id buildingId, room_name AS roomName, type, mon_rent AS monRent, status, begin_date AS beginDate, end_date AS endDate, liver, remark
mapper.select:
select
r.id ,r.building_id buildingId, r.room_name AS roomName, r.type, r.mon_rent AS monRent, r.status, r.begin_date AS beginDate, r.end_date AS endDate, t.tenant_name as liver, r.remark
from room r left join tenant t on r.liver = t.identity_card where 1=1
and r.building_id = #{buildingId}

select

from room r left join tenant t on r.liver = t.identity_card where 1=1
